name: Love Story in the school
description:
"Love story" although it is a love to develop the game, but from another point of view, it can be said to be a true reproduction of the high school three years of life simulation game. "Heartbeat" provides an opportunity for players to spend three years in a variety of ways to get the best time, players can try before the college life has never lived before. As the "heartbeat" of the game time and real time is exactly the same, in a year three semesters, all the dates, holidays, school fixed events, etc., are fully set, play more realistic, such as back to college life.
"Heart beat" provides a lot of game scenes for playing, some scenes and emotional life, and some have nothing to do. You can meet, chat, dating, and pour out each other in a number of situations you can pursue. The brilliant high school in the game is very real, there are classrooms, school buildings, sports fields, swimming pools and all kinds of modern school must have a variety of hardware and software equipment. In addition to the emotional life, play must be from time to time to pay attention to their schoolwork. You can also participate in various community, make more friends. During the school competitions, you can also free to register.
